description: ACM Sensor Deep-Dive - Detailed diagnostics with drill-down navigation. Use top links to navigate between dashboards. Click panel titles for detailed views.

links.title: 🏠 Fleet Overview
links.tooltip: View all equipment health at a glance

panels.description: Top 5 sensors' contribution to anomaly score over time

targets.rawSql:
-- Top 5 sensors by current contribution
WITH TopSensors AS (
    SELECT TOP 5 SensorName
    FROM ACM_ContributionCurrent
    WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND ActiveDefect = 1
    ORDER BY ContributionPct DESC
)
SELECT 
    h.Timestamp AS time,
    h.SensorName,
    ROUND(h.ContributionPct, 1) AS value,
    'metric' AS metric
FROM ACM_SensorHotspotTimeline h
INNER JOIN TopSensors t ON h.SensorName = t.SensorName
WHERE h.EquipID = $equipment
    AND h.Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Sensor Contribution Timeline (Top 5)

panels.description: Heatmap showing which detectors are firing for each sensor

targets.rawSql:
-- Pivot detector signals by sensor
SELECT 
    SensorName AS 'Sensor',
    MAX(CASE WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%AR1%' THEN ROUND(CurrentZ, 2) ELSE NULL END) AS 'AR1',
    MAX(CASE WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%PCA-SPE%' THEN ROUND(CurrentZ, 2) ELSE NULL END) AS 'PCA-SPE',
    MAX(CASE WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%PCA-T%' THEN ROUND(CurrentZ, 2) ELSE NULL END) AS 'PCA-T²',
    MAX(CASE WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%IForest%' OR DetectorLabel LIKE '%Isolation%' THEN ROUND(CurrentZ, 2) ELSE NULL END) AS 'IForest',
    MAX(CASE WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%GMM%' OR DetectorLabel LIKE '%Gaussian%' THEN ROUND(CurrentZ, 2) ELSE NULL END) AS 'GMM',
    MAX(CASE WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%OMR%' OR DetectorLabel LIKE '%Overall%' THEN ROUND(CurrentZ, 2) ELSE NULL END) AS 'OMR'
FROM ACM_SensorDefects
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND ActiveDefect = 1
GROUP BY SensorName
ORDER BY 
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%AR1%' THEN CurrentZ ELSE 0 END), 0) +
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%PCA%' THEN CurrentZ ELSE 0 END), 0) +
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%IForest%' THEN CurrentZ ELSE 0 END), 0) +
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%GMM%' THEN CurrentZ ELSE 0 END), 0) +
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%OMR%' THEN CurrentZ ELSE 0 END), 0) DESC

panels.title: Detector Signals Heatmap (By Sensor)

panels.description: Comprehensive sensor ranking with defect frequency, max Z-score, and last occurrence

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    sr.SensorName AS 'Sensor',
    sr.DefectCount AS 'Defect Count',
    ROUND(sr.MaxZ, 2) AS 'Max Z',
    ROUND(sr.AvgZ, 2) AS 'Avg Z',
    sr.DominantDetector AS 'Dominant Detector',
    sr.LastSeen AS 'Last Seen'
FROM ACM_SensorRanking sr
WHERE sr.EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY sr.DefectCount DESC, sr.MaxZ DESC

panels.title: Sensor Defect Statistics

panels.description: Actual vs forecasted sensor values (if sensor forecasting is enabled)

targets.rawSql:
-- Actual sensor values (normalized)
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    SensorName,
    NormalizedValue AS value,
    'metric' AS metric
FROM ACM_SensorNormalized_TS
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
    AND SensorName IN (
        SELECT TOP 3 SensorName 
        FROM ACM_ContributionCurrent 
        WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND ActiveDefect = 1
        ORDER BY ContributionPct DESC
    )
ORDER BY time ASC

-- Forecasted sensor values
SELECT 
    ForecastTime AS time,
    SensorName + ' (Forecast)' AS SensorName,
    PredictedValue AS value,
    'metric' AS metric
FROM ACM_SensorForecast
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND ForecastTime BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND DATEADD(HOUR, 168, $__timeTo())
    AND SensorName IN (
        SELECT TOP 3 SensorName 
        FROM ACM_ContributionCurrent 
        WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND ActiveDefect = 1
        ORDER BY ContributionPct DESC
    )
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Sensor Values & Forecasts (Top 3 Contributors)

panels.description: OMR (Overall Model Residual) sensor-to-sensor prediction contributions

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 20
    TargetSensor AS 'Target Sensor',
    PredictorSensor AS 'Predictor Sensor',
    ROUND(Residual, 3) AS 'Residual',
    ROUND(Contribution, 2) AS 'Contribution %',
    LastUpdated AS 'Last Updated'
FROM ACM_OMRContributionsLong
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Residual DESC

panels.title: OMR Sensor-to-Sensor Contributions

panels.description: OMR residuals over time for top sensors

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    SensorName,
    Residual AS value,
    'metric' AS metric
FROM ACM_OMRTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
    AND SensorName IN (
        SELECT TOP 5 SensorName
        FROM ACM_ContributionCurrent
        WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND ActiveDefect = 1
        ORDER BY ContributionPct DESC
    )
ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: OMR Residual Timeline (Top 5 Sensors)

panels.description: Count of sensors by severity level

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 5 THEN 'CRITICAL'
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 3 THEN 'WARNING'
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 2 THEN 'CAUTION'
        ELSE 'NORMAL'
    END AS 'Severity',
    COUNT(*) AS 'Count'
FROM ACM_SensorDefects
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND ActiveDefect = 1
GROUP BY CASE 
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 5 THEN 'CRITICAL'
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 3 THEN 'WARNING'
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 2 THEN 'CAUTION'
        ELSE 'NORMAL'
    END
ORDER BY 
    CASE Severity
        WHEN 'CRITICAL' THEN 1
        WHEN 'WARNING' THEN 2
        WHEN 'CAUTION' THEN 3
        ELSE 4
    END

panels.title: Sensors by Severity

panels.description: Which detector identifies the most sensor defects

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%AR1%' THEN 'AR1'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%PCA-SPE%' THEN 'PCA-SPE'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%PCA-T%' THEN 'PCA-T²'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%IForest%' OR DetectorLabel LIKE '%Isolation%' THEN 'IForest'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%GMM%' OR DetectorLabel LIKE '%Gaussian%' THEN 'GMM'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%OMR%' OR DetectorLabel LIKE '%Overall%' THEN 'OMR'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END AS 'Detector',
    COUNT(*) AS 'Sensor Count'
FROM ACM_SensorDefects
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND ActiveDefect = 1
GROUP BY CASE 
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%AR1%' THEN 'AR1'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%PCA-SPE%' THEN 'PCA-SPE'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%PCA-T%' THEN 'PCA-T²'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%IForest%' OR DetectorLabel LIKE '%Isolation%' THEN 'IForest'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%GMM%' OR DetectorLabel LIKE '%Gaussian%' THEN 'GMM'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%OMR%' OR DetectorLabel LIKE '%Overall%' THEN 'OMR'
        ELSE 'Other'
    END
ORDER BY 'Sensor Count' DESC

panels.title: Defects by Detector

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN CurrentZ < 1 THEN '0-1'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 2 THEN '1-2'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 3 THEN '2-3'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 4 THEN '3-4'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 5 THEN '4-5'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 6 THEN '5-6'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 7 THEN '6-7'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 8 THEN '7-8'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 9 THEN '8-9'
        ELSE '9+'
    END AS 'Z-Score Range',
    COUNT(*) AS 'Count'
FROM ACM_SensorDefects
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND ActiveDefect = 1
GROUP BY CASE 
        WHEN CurrentZ < 1 THEN '0-1'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 2 THEN '1-2'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 3 THEN '2-3'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 4 THEN '3-4'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 5 THEN '4-5'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 6 THEN '5-6'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 7 THEN '6-7'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 8 THEN '7-8'
        WHEN CurrentZ < 9 THEN '8-9'
        ELSE '9+'
    END
ORDER BY 'Z-Score Range'

panels.description: Individual sensor health scores (100 - normalized Z-score)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 20
    SensorName AS 'Sensor',
    DetectorLabel AS 'Dominant Detector',
    ROUND(CurrentZ, 2) AS 'Current Z',
    ROUND(CASE 
        WHEN CurrentZ > 10 THEN 0
        ELSE 100 - (CurrentZ * 10)
    END, 1) AS 'Health Score',
    LastUpdated AS 'Last Updated'
FROM ACM_SensorDefects
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND ActiveDefect = 1
ORDER BY 'Health Score' ASC

panels.title: Sensor Health Scores

panels.description: Count of sensors by severity level

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 5 THEN 'CRITICAL'
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 3 THEN 'WARNING'
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 2 THEN 'CAUTION'
        ELSE 'NORMAL'
    END AS 'Severity',
    COUNT(*) AS 'Count'
FROM ACM_SensorDefects
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    AND ActiveDefect = 1
GROUP BY CASE 
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 5 THEN 'CRITICAL'
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 3 THEN 'WARNING'
        WHEN CurrentZ >= 2 THEN 'CAUTION'
        ELSE 'NORMAL'
    END
ORDER BY 
    CASE Severity
        WHEN 'CRITICAL' THEN 1
        WHEN 'WARNING' THEN 2
        WHEN 'CAUTION' THEN 3
        ELSE 4
    END

    CASE

        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%PCA-SPE%' THEN 'PCA-SPE'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%PCA-T%' THEN 'PCA-T²'

        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%PCA-SPE%' THEN 'PCA-SPE'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%PCA-T%' THEN 'PCA-T²'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%IForest%' OR DetectorLabel LIKE '%Isolation%' THEN 'IForest'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%GMM%' OR DetectorLabel LIKE '%Gaussian%' THEN 'GMM'
        WHEN DetectorLabel LIKE '%OMR%' OR DetectorLabel LIKE '%Overall%' THEN 'OMR'
